text: Zhang Liangliang (; born 1 October 1982) is a Chinese foil fencer. He competed in the men's team foil competition at the 2012 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese male fencers Category:Chinese foil fencers Category:Olympic fencers of China Category:Fencers at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers from Anhui Category:Fencers at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Fencers at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:People from Bengbu Category:Universiade gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 2003 Summer Universiade
title: Zhang Liangliang
